comments:
Build 20020412 + jdt/core performance patch 239d

Was editing some source, and formatted it and got an error dialog with stack 
trace pasted below.

Source in editor was:
[import org.eclipse.jdt.core.ToolFactory;
import org.eclipse.jdt.core.util.IClassFileDisassembler;
import org.eclipse.jdt.core.util.IClassFileReader;

public class Disassemble {

	public static void main(String[] arguments) {

		IClassFileDisassembler disasm =
			ToolFactory.createDefaultClassFileDisassembler();
		String str =
			disasm.disassemble(
				ToolFactory.createDefaultClassFileReader(
				
	"d:/eclipse/workspaces/dev2.0/plugins/Crap/bin/p1/X.class",
					IClassFileReader.ALL)),
			"\n");
	}

}]

This source was define inside a test project dependent on Jdt/Core.
